sentences.sContent: Old Walter is setting down his memories of village life.
sentences.sCn: 老瓦尔特正在写他的乡村生活回忆录。

sentences.sContent: Top priority for me is getting him off this plane so I can finally set down my gun.
sentences.sCn: 现在对于我来说最要紧的事就是让他下飞机，这样我就能放下我的枪了。

sentences.sContent: I like to make suggestions rather than setting down laws and forcing people to follow them.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢提建议而不是制定法律并强迫人们去遵守。

trans.tranOther: If you set down your thoughts or experiences, you write them all down.
